title: Serenade Website Short description.docx
summary: Serenade in the Pines is a 1940s-inspired evening of gourmet dining and timeless melodies. Enjoy an evening of Rat Pack style standards performed by Lake Arrowhead's finest vocalists. Indulge in a three-course dinner crafted by the Tudor Houseâ€™s new culinary team. Formal attire is encouraged, and special kids' meals are available.
